preparation.raw_text:
1. In a fume hood, carefully weigh 40.00 g of arsenic using a precision balance. 
 2. Weigh 19.20 g of lithium in a separate container. 
 3. Measure 27.60 g of silicon. 
 4. Combine all three materials in a clean, dry ceramic or glass mixing bowl. 
 5. Use a pestle and mortar to grind the mixture until it is homogeneously fine. Ensure no lumps remain.
